resources.string: are you sure want to add this course to your cart ?

string-array.name: courseobj
string-array.item: The objective of this course is to teach Android very easily.
The objective of this course is to teach Java very easily.
The objective of this course is to teach Oracle very easily.
The objective of this course is to teach PHP very easily.

string-array.name: coursecont
string-array.item: The contents are Activities, Services, Types of Layouts, Google Maps, Sqllite database
The contents are Java Data Types, Arrays, Inheritance, String Processing, Encapsulation, Threads, Building Database Applications with JDBC

The contents are PL/SQL Language Fundamentals, Queries, Subqueries, Managing Tables using DML statements, Control Statement, Collection Types, Cursors, Errors and Exceptions, Stored Procedure and Function, Triggers, Packages
The contents are PHP Operators , Array and Loops, Array Functions, String Processing, file Functions, Session Management, MySQL DB Connectivity
